sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog v-model="isDisplay" width="600px">
    <v-card>
      <v-card-title>タスク追加</v-card-title>
      <v-card-text>
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col>
              <v-text-field
              v-model="taskName"
              type="text"
              placeholder="タスク名を入力してください"
              />
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
          
          <v-row>
            <v-col>
              <v-select
              :items="priority"
              v-model="priority"
              label="緊急度">
              </v-select>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>

          <v-row>
            <v-col>
              <v-select
              :items="status"
              v-model="status"
              label="状態">
              </v-select>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>

          <v-row>
            <v-col>
              <v-menu
              ref="menu"
              v-model="modal"
              :return-value.sync="dates"
              persistent
              width="300px"
              >
              <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                <v-text-field
                v-model="dateRangeText"
                label="開始〜終了日"
                prepend-icon="mdi-calendar"
                readonly
                v-bind="attrs"
                v-on="on"
                >
                </v-text-field>
              </template>
              <v-date-picker
              v-model="dates"
              scrollable
              range
              >
              <v-spacer></v-spacer>
              <v-btn
              text
              color="primary"
              @click="modal = false"
              >
                Cancel
              </v-btn>
              <v-btn
              text
              color="primary"
              @click="$refs.menu.save(dates)"
              >
                OK
              </v-btn>
              </v-date-picker>
              </v-menu>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>

          <v-row>
            <v-col>
              <v-btn medium id="btnColor" @click="addTodo">
                追加
              </v-btn>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
// import axios from "axios";
// import MyApi from "@/common/myApi.js";

export default({
  data: () => ({
    isDisplay: false,
    taskName: "",
    priority: ["高い", "普通", "低い"],
    status: ["未着手", "進行中", "完了"],
    userInfo: [],
    dates: [],
  }),
  methods: {
    addTodo(){
      this.isDisplay = false;
    },
    save(dates) {
      this.$ref.dialog.save(dates)
    },
  },
})
</script>
